oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Din ve dünyaya nâfi yirmi üç hikmet : manuscript, undated
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in naskh script, in one column, 19 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. First two leaves framed within double black and golden now faded lines. Catchwords.
Glazed light-cream laid paper, boards covered with marbled paper, red leather spine.

With: Dürr-i meknûn (ff. 1v-28r) ; Vasiyet etmek hakkında risale (ff. 34r-37r) ; Ma'rūzāt (ff. 37v-50r) ; Kânûnnâme-yi cedide fî-mâ yete'allak bi'l-arâzî (ff. 50r-71v) ; Fetvâlar (ff. 76v-89r) ; Kitāb Jawāhir al-farāʼiḍ (ff. 98v-102v).
MS Turk 11. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islamic ethics
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Karateke, Ottoman Turkish manuscripts and documents at Harvard's Houghton Library,
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: دين ودنيايه نافع يكرمي اوج حكمت : manuscript, undated
